Message:
I tried asking
the two of them...
But, why are they
smiling like that...?

“I see... So, you’re at
that age now too, are you...?”

“When you invite someone out,
it’d be best if you found
a way to...set the mood.

After saying that,
the two of them
taught me a lot of
useful tidbits of wisdom.

Um, like...“do this
when it’s snowing,”
or, “do that while
enjoying the night air”...

I guess they mean
that I should
make it snow at night...?

Snow, huh...?
Then, my next stop is...!

To get even more wisdom
this time, I came to
Master Gil’uial to learn magic
that would help me
make it snow.

But, Master Gil’uial
was smirking at me, too...
I wonder why...?
